statements: SELECT * FROM security_breaches;
SELECT company_name, breach_date FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'Data Leak';
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE affected_records > 10000;
SELECT company_name, breach_type FROM security_breaches ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_breaches FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'Malware Attack';
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_date = '2021-05-20';
SELECT company_name, breach_type, affected_records FROM security_breaches WHERE affected_records > 10000;
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'Data Leak' AND affected_records BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT company_name, breach_date FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, SUM(affected_records) AS total_records FROM security_breaches GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_records > 5000;
SELECT * FROM security_breaches
SELECT breach_description, breach_date FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_id = 1
SELECT breached_company, breach_date FROM security_breaches ORDER BY breach_id DESC
SELECT * FROM mitigation_plans WHERE mitigation_cost > 1000
SELECT breach_id, mitigation_strategy FROM mitigation_plans JOIN security_breaches ON mitigation_plans.breach_id = security_breaches.breach_id
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_id = 1;
SELECT breached_company, breach_date FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT breach_description FROM security_breaches WHERE breached_company = 'Company A';
SELECT * FROM mitigation_plans WHERE mitigation_cost > 5000 ORDER BY mitigation_cost DESC;
SELECT breached_company, breach_date, plan_id FROM security_breaches INNER JOIN mitigation_plans ON security_breaches.breach_id = mitigation_plans.breach_id;
SELECT * FROM security_breaches ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, breach_type, data_records_lost FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'Phishing';
SELECT breach_id, company_name, breach_type FROM security_breaches WHERE data_records_lost > 10000;
SELECT DISTINCT city, state, country FROM breach_locations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT breach_id, severity_level, analysis_date FROM breach_analysis WHERE severity_level = 'High' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_breaches;
SELECT breach_id, company_name, breach_date FROM security_breaches ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT breach_id, company_name, data_records_lost FROM security_breaches WHERE data_records_lost > 10000;
SELECT company_name, breach_type, breach_description FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'Phishing' AND data_records_lost > 5000;

SELECT bl.city, bl.state, bl.country, sb.company_name, ba.severity_level FROM breach_locations bl JOIN security_breaches sb ON bl.breach_id = sb.breach_id JOIN breach_analysis ba ON sb.breach_id = ba.breach_id WHERE ba.analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_breaches;
SELECT breach_id, company_name, breach_type FROM security_breaches WHERE data_records_lost > 10000;
SELECT breach_id, breach_date, company_name FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, breach_id, analysis_date FROM breach_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, mitigation_date, mitigation_plan FROM breach_mitigation WHERE mitigation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_breaches ORDER BY breach_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, breach_type, data_records_lost FROM security_breaches WHERE data_records_lost > 1000 ORDER BY data_records_lost DESC;
SELECT company_name, breach_type, analysis_report FROM security_breaches INNER JOIN breach_analysis ON security_breaches.breach_id = breach_analysis.breach_id;

SELECT company_name, analysis_date, mitigation_plan FROM breach_analysis INNER JOIN breach_mitigation ON breach_analysis.analysis_id = breach_mitigation.analysis_id WHERE analysis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT breach_id, analysis_report, log_message FROM breach_analysis INNER JOIN mitigation_logs ON breach_analysis.analysis_id = mitigation_logs.mitigation_id ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM security_breaches;
SELECT type, description FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM affected_companies ORDER BY industry;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE breach_id = 3;
SELECT financial_cost, data_records_affected FROM breach_impact WHERE financial_cost > 10000;
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE type = 'Cyber Attack';
SELECT breach_date, type FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM security_breaches WHERE id = 3;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM affected_companies ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT breach_id, financial_cost, data_records_affected FROM breach_impact WHERE financial_cost > 1000;
